description: Main page component for a note-taking web application built with React. Manages state for notes, handles CRUD operations via API calls, and renders child components such as header, sidebar, notes list, and note editor.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for displaying and editing notes, managing state, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Function to fetch the list of notes from the API, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: handleNewNote
methods.description: Function to initialize the creation of a new note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Function to save the current note, either creating a new one or updating an existing one.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Function to delete a specified note.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Function to select a note based on its ID.
